backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the StaySpread backend, defining data types and shared functions for user profiles, property listings, bookings, promoters, and Stripe checkout session management with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the StaySpread deployment feature to its associated frontend files, backend components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, including PWA meta tags, Apple touch icon, manifest link, and the mount point for the React application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for StaySpread, specifying app name, theme colors, display mode, and a full set of icon sizes from 48px to 512px.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (home, listings, listing detail, host/promoter dashboards, payment success/failure) and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Booking form component with check-in/check-out date pickers, nightly price calculation, and integration with booking and Stripe checkout session mutations to redirect users to Stripe.
frontend/src/components/CreateListingFor: A modal dialog form for creating a new property listing, handling image uploads, form validation, and submission via the useCreateListing hook.
A modal dialog form for editing an existing property listing, pre-populating fields from the listing prop and submitting updates via the useUpdateListing hook.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer component displaying branding, quick navigation links, and social media icons with a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A sticky site header with navigation links conditionally shown based on user role (host/promoter) and a login/logout button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Displays a grid of property images with a lightbox dialog for full-size viewing and prev/next navigation between images.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: A card component that displays a property listing's thumbnail, name, location, and price per night, linking to the listing detail page with an optional referral parameter.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to create a profile by entering their name and selecting a role (traveler, host, or promoter).
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: The root layout wrapper that composes the Header, Footer, ProfileSetup modal, and renders child routes via an Outlet.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: A modal dialog component that prompts users to configure Stripe payments by entering a secret key and allowed countries, shown only when Stripe is not yet configured.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooking.ts: A React Query mutation hook that calls the backend `createBooking` method with listing ID, check-in/out times, and an optional promoter code.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: A React Query mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor, returning the session ID and redirect URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: React Query hooks for fetching property listings sorted by price and for creating, updating, and deleting listings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePromoter.ts: A React Query hook that fetches the caller's promoter referral code from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: React Query hooks for checking whether Stripe is configured and for saving a new Stripe configuration via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the authenticated caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The home page component featuring a hero section, a 'How It Works' explainer with host/promoter/traveler cards, and a grid of featured property listings.
frontend/src/pages/HostDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page for authenticated hosts to view, create, edit, and delete their property listings, with Stripe setup integration and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetail.tsx: Detail page for a single property listing showing images, description, amenities, and a booking form; supports referral codes via URL search params.
frontend/src/pages/ListingsBrowse.tsx: Browse page that fetches and displays all property listings in a responsive grid with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Static page shown after a cancelled or failed payment, informing the user no charges were made and linking back to listings.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Static confirmation page displayed after a successful booking payment, with a link to browse more properties.
frontend/src/pages/PromoterDashboard.tsx: Dashboard for authenticated promoters to view and copy their referral link and see an earnings overview; enforces promoter role access.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH color tokens, border radius variables, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall state of the StaySpread project including architecture notes, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata. Describes a short-term rental affiliate marketplace built with React/TypeScript, Motoko, Stripe, and Internet Identity.
